Reviews.Title: Net10 LG Optimus Net No-Cotract Touchscreen Prepaid Cell Phone with Unlimited Calls and Data
Reviews.Author: Michael Horstmeyer
Reviews.Content: I have had the phone for about 5 weeks and love it. I upgraded to this phone from an LG pay-as-you-go flip phone with only calling ability. I wanted to have Internet service....to browse, check email, gps, google maps, etc. The service I feel makes it worth the $50.00 a month ( $45.00 with auto-refill ) Is the unlimited mobile data. For the people not having knowledge of what the advantage of unlimited mobile data means I will explain. Most of my friends have some brand of Contract phone service. This includes high dollar I-Phones, etc. Contract phone have different monthly fee's based on how much mobile data they want to pay for. So you see them always trying to find a hot spot for free internet to browse, email, etc. They do not want to use their mobile data and exceed their limited time or minutes or they are charge extra. I do not even turn my wifi on ( just more drain on battery ) and I do not need it. This also means unlimited Texting. Hope this helped!!!

Reviews.Title: Lg Optimus 2
Reviews.Author: dougefresh
Reviews.Content: Had phone for two years with no problems. For the discounted price you couldn't get a better phone and I did a lot of research on it

Reviews.Title: some phones malfunction be aware
Reviews.Author: isaac rodriguez
Reviews.Content: i chose this rating because i have this phone and it worked great but as soon as i ordered a phone for a friend this phone acted up as soon as she downloaded the app for games memory storage is limited and will start to malfunction if theres is too much dada on the phone but otherwise if your a problem solver u will be happy if ur not a problem solver stay away also u run out of service after 30 days when some months have 31 days all in all its an ok phone for the money if ur a senior citizen and dont know much about  these types of phones stay with the conventional flip phone its your best bet

Reviews.Content: I gave this product 4 stars because it was EXACTLY what I was expecting, I'm very happy with the product itself, and would recommend it to anyone looking for this kind of phone and service.

Reviews.Title: affordable entry level smart phone
Reviews.Author: Charles G Peterson
Reviews.Content: This is a very functional entry level 3G smartphone at an affordable price.However the battery must be charged almost daily and the screen size is a little bit small for my far-sighted vision.I will probably purchase another phone with a larger screen in the future.
